prompt:
Create a VIRAL WhatsApp Status image with MAXIMUM visual impact:

    Create inspiring WhatsApp status (1080x1920px) with split transformation visual: left side shows humble auto-rickshaw in black & white, right side shows luxury car in golden colors. Center headline 'AUTO DRIVER BECAME CROREPATI' in 80px golden bold text. Middle shows journey: '₹1000 monthly SIP × 25 years = ₹1.2 CRORE' in 56px white. Bottom 'If he can, YOU can!' in 64px red bold. Dramatic lighting, success story theme. 100px padding. Include subtle branding: 'Shruti Petkar' in #1A73E8 color at bottom, ARN text 'ARN: ARN_SHRUTI_001' in small gray font. Professional financial advisor branding integrated seamlessly.

    TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
    - Dimensions: EXACTLY 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 aspect ratio)
    - Padding: 100px on all sides for WhatsApp UI compatibility
    - Font sizes: Headlines 76-92px, supporting text 48-64px
    - High contrast for mobile viewing
    - Sharp, crisp text that's readable at small sizes

    VIRAL OPTIMIZATION:
    - SHOCKING visual impact within 0.5 seconds
    - Dramatic lighting and colors
    - Clear visual hierarchy: Hook → Stats → Action
    - Professional but eye-catching design
    - Photorealistic elements where specified

    QUALITY STANDARDS:
    - Grammy Award-level visual design
    - 8K resolution quality
    - Perfect typography alignment
    - Consistent brand integration
    - Mobile-first optimization

    Style: Professional financial marketing with viral social media aesthetics
